divs: Sighting DetailsI was taking a picture of the harvest moon from my front porch, I took many by the way, and none of them at the angel this one was taken. When I viewed them on the computer that is when I saw it. Look for yourself and you tell me what I caught? The object was in my view finder but was not visable to my eyes.
